Caching library

Opis Cache is a caching library, with support for multiple backend storages, that provides developers an API which allows them to deal with cached content in a standardised way, no matter where that content is stored. Also, the Opis Cache's simple and effective architecture, ensures that support for new backend storages can be easily achieved by simply implementing an interface.

The currently supported storages are: APC, APCU, Database, File, Memory, Memcache, Memcached, MongoDB, Proxy, Redis, WinCache, XCache, ZendCache and ZendMemory.

{% include subtitle.html value="Requirements" %}
  • PHP 5.3.* or higher
  • Opis Closure 1.3.*
  • Opis Database 2.0.* (for Database storage)
  • Predis 1.0.* (for Redis storage)
{% include subtitle.html value="Installation" %}

Opis Cache is available on {% include packagist.html project = "cache" %} and can be installed using Composer.

If you are unable to use Composer you can download the {% include archive.html project = site.projects.cache file = "tar.gz" %} or the {% include archive.html project = site.projects.cache file = "zip" %} archive file, extract the content of the archive and include de autoload.php file into your project.
